name: Nail Art Fashion Beauty Salon
description:
Get into an engaging Nail Art Fashion Beauty Salon, where you will experience handling of a cash register in beautifully designed nail art salon. Be a shop cashier and & operate ATM machine, expertly perform nail coloring and nail polish in virtual nail art salon game.
Withdraw cash from the bank using ATM machine then collect receipt of kiosk machine. Moreover, As an expert beautician, perform nail coloring with exceptional nail art skills while handling cash with the help of cash register.

Features:

- Beautifully designed HD 3D graphics.
- Astonishing sounds & effects of free nail game.
- Engaging nail designing simulation in virtual nail art salon.
- Highly additive best free nail game based play mode.
